text: Pavel Vranský (29 April 1921 - 24 June 2018) was a Czech brigadier general. He was known for serving during the Siege of Tobruk. He is a recipient of the War Cross and Medal of Merit He was born in Lipník nad Bečvou. Vranský died on 24 June 2018 in Lipník, aged 97.Zemřel Pavel Vranský, veterán bojů u Tobruku a letec RAF ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Czech people Category:Generals
title: Pavel Vranský
